thread.section_title: Woman caught giving man blow job in Domino’s says it hasn’t put her off public sex – Metro
thread.title: Woman caught giving man blow job in Domino’s says it hasn’t put her off public sex
thread.title_full: Woman caught giving man blow job in Domino’s says it hasn’t put her off public sex

author: Nicole Morley
title: Woman caught giving man blow job in Domino’s says it hasn’t put her off public sex
text:
The couple were trying to top their public, ahem, encounters (Picture: Facebook) A woman recorded on CCTV giving her boyfriend a blow job in Domino’s after ordering a stuffed crust pizza says being caught hasn’t put them off public romps. 
After footage of their Daniella Hirst, 28, and Craig Smith, 31 went viral, the couple boast: ‘We love having sex in weird places.’
Photographer captures chilling domestic violence as it’s happening Footage captured in a branch of Domino’s reportedlu shows Daniella on her knees performing a sex act on Smith, before he tugs down her trousers and starts thrusting from behind.
As you can see, the entire encounter is very romantic… 
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Sadly, it seems the police aren’t sympathetic to the couple and their insatiable taste for one another – and pizza – as they’re both being investigated for the offence of outraging public decency.
The modern-day Romeo and Juliet added they were waiting for their 12-inch pepperoni when they ‘got a bit frisky’ at the counter in Scarborough, North Yorkshire.
Elderly dementia patient who died covered in unexplained injuries sparks care home inquiry A 40-second clip, which was leaked online, apparently showed barmaid Daniella performing a sex act on her boyfriend while staff prepared their order oblivious to what was happening.
Daniella said critics of their antics are ‘boring’. She explained: ‘I’m very open-minded about sex and public places.
 
Try to control yourselves (Picture: Domino’s) ‘I love the thrill you may get caught,’ she told The Sun . ‘But obviously I never thought we’d get caught like this.’
Hirst and Smith, who met three months ago in the pub where she works, had been drinking in Leeds before heading to Scarborough on Saturday evening to celebrate his birthday.
The couple, from Bridlington, East Yorks, checked into a room in a pub and went to Domino’s at 11pm.
Craig, a builder, also revealed the other al fresco places they’ve had we’d had sex with each other – including a bus, a van, a hotel, swimming pool and a field. He explained: ‘We wanted to see if we could top it.
‘We got a bit frisky and one thing led to another.’
More: UK Someone parked their dog and horse in Morrisons car park 
More than 75 pupils sent home for 'too tight' trousers 
London nightclub Cirque le Soir ‘turns away black American footballers for being “too urban”‘ 
A North Yorkshire police spokeswoman said: ‘Having been made aware of video footage of a sex act between two people, taking place inside the public area of a pizza takeaway in Scarborough, police are investigating an offence of outraging public decency.
‘The investigation is in the early stages and no arrests have been made at this time.’
According to the law, outraging public decency is an indictable offence.
Any person who carries out an act of obscene nature in the public can be charged with this offence.
Conviction carries a maximum of sentence of six months in prison or a fine.
